channel.title: Importing Data on Craig Hutton, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Importing Data on Craig Hutton, PhD

item.title: A Scientist's Guide to R: Step 1. Getting Data into R
item.description: 1 TL;DR 2 Introduction 3 Installing and loading R packages 4 How to get your data into R 4.1 comma delimited files (.csv) files 4.2 tab delimited (.txt) files 4.3 files with other delimiting characters (also .txt) 4.4 Microsoft Excel files (.xlsx, .xls) 4.5 files from SPSS, SAS, or Stata 4.6 fixed width files (.txt, .gz, .bz2, .xz, .zip, etc.) 4.7 html/xml files 4.8 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) files 4.
